title: Angel on my shoulder
creator_credit: Charles R. Rogers and Archie Mayo
brief_description: Film Noir classic wherein the devil promises leniency to a dead gangster if he will return to earth and take over the body of a judge who is stamping out evil. Stars Claude Rains, Paul Muni and Anne Baxter.
description: Film Noir classic wherein the devil promises leniency to a dead gangster if he will return to earth and take over the body of a judge who is stamping out evil. Stars Claude Rains, Paul Muni and Anne Baxter.
